content.rendered:
At Brand825, It's All About You

Every day, we get to collaborate with brands like yours to create marketing that piques curiosity, creates connections and leaves a lasting impression. It's pretty sweet.

We're a dedicated team of world-class marketers, content strategists, digital media experts, graphic designers and web developers that strongly believes:

Your Unique Brand Merits Unique Marketing

No two brands are the same, so we'll deliver marketing strategies and tactics that work best for your business.

You Deserve Transparency and Honesty

We will never make a promise we cannot keep. If we say we're going to get something done for you, then we're going to deliver.

You'll Get the Most Marketing for Your Budget

Our team will tap into every opportunity, tactic, method, trick and hack we possibly can to get the most marketing for your money—without going over your budget.

How can we help your brand today?

See Our Services

Your Payoff Is in Our PROCESS

Discover

We learn everything we can about your business and the goals you want to accomplish through marketing.

Plan

Factoring in your business' unique needs, budget and objectives, we'll craft a tailored strategy that will work best for you.

Create

Using best practices and years of experience, our team will design, write, record and develop the marketing tactics outlined in the strategy.

Execute

Our team will use checklists, project plans and work management software to execute the various marketing tactics.

Measure

Detailed reporting will tell us where your campaigns are performing well, as well as opportunities for improvement.

Meet Our Co-Founders

Kedran Brush
Co-Founder & CEO
Cindy Baker
Co-Founder & Chief Creative Officer

Kedran Brush and Cindy Baker started Brand825 after leaving long careers as corporate marketing executives. They saw firsthand how the right strategy and messaging could transform a business. But they also noticed how smaller companies often struggled to access the same level of expertise. That's why they created Brand825—to bring their passion for building brands to businesses of all sizes, not just the big players.

Our Perspective on Marketing

Marketing plays a critical role in driving business growth. CEOs often look to their marketing teams to attract new customers, retain existing ones and grow revenue. We understand that marketing isn't just about creating awareness—it's about delivering measurable impact and staying ahead of the competition.

At Brand825, we believe that every company, regardless of size, deserves access to high-caliber marketing that achieves these goals. Our mission is to provide data-driven strategies and creative solutions that empower businesses to grow, compete and succeed. Whether it's building a stronger brand, reaching untapped audiences or driving revenue, we're here to make marketing work harder for you.

Let's Talk

Let's Talk.

CONTACT DETAILS

Phone: (615) 873-5777
Email: getanswers@brand825.com
Web: www.brand825.com

Connect.

FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL
